description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jump start your brain! Exercise your math, words and puzzle skills across 11 different games. Give your thumbs a rest and give your brain a workout by playing this game.
